name: Ludum Dare 50 (vertexmachina, Michelle Olson, gryph0n, Flaccidnoise)
name_original: Ludum Dare 50 (vertexmachina, Michelle Olson, gryph0n, Flaccidnoise)
description:
You have crashed into a strange ocean and your ship is being attacked by malevolent life forms.

Defend yourself at all costs.

[Controls]  

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move forward and backward, left and right

Mouse: Look around

Left Click: Fire

Space: Move Up

Left Shift: Move Down
